stimulusHtml: Which of the following is an implication of political parties in both Iran and Russia?
choicesHtml: A lack of political parties in both countries is a major contributor to voter apathy in national elections.
Political parties in both countries have successful regional parties which formed to counter the dominant parties in each country.
The irrelevance of the traditional left-right ideological spectrum has reduced the importance of political parties in both countries.
There has been a left-right polarization in both countries caused by economic class cleavages.
